data.text: @FashionablyLife @PatHeron1 @loosewomen @KensingtonRoyal Haha, great thanks, yourself.. I’ve been busy today so haven’t seen much..
@FashionablyLife @PatHeron1 @loosewomen @KensingtonRoyal Not you again 😂😂 haha, I said my opinion, this topic... New day New topic 😂
@ashley1413 @FashionablyLife @loosewomen @KensingtonRoyal Why? It's private. Nothing to do with us.
@PatHeron1 @FashionablyLife @loosewomen @KensingtonRoyal He was in hospital!! It wasn’t his fault he couldn’t get there... he’s a father of a royal now, so they should release a statement

@ashley1413 @FashionablyLife @loosewomen @KensingtonRoyal Accomadation was booked for him and 3 suits ordered. He was also offered help in how to deal with the media and he refused. Nothing to do with us if they don't have a relationship so why should they release a statement.  He should just shut up.
@loosewomen It's such a sad thing to be estranged from your kids, any of them. Hard to know how to move on and get family back together♡
@FashionablyLife @loosewomen @KensingtonRoyal Haha! Glad you’ve had fun! It would be really boring if everyone had the same opinion 🙂

@FashionablyLife @loosewomen @KensingtonRoyal All the irrelevant going of track.. Kensington Palace should release a statement, and that’s just my opinion, you can go on and on if you want, but that’s my opinion and I’m sticking by it 🙂
@FashionablyLife @loosewomen @KensingtonRoyal Yeah and that’s your opinion, I ain’t the one having ago, I’m just saying my opinion, like you are weather you like it or no
@FashionablyLife @loosewomen @KensingtonRoyal Like I said it’s amazing what paper makes up, for everyone to believe.. weather he done that or no, he’s still her dad
@Mx1969 @loosewomen @KensingtonRoyal I just think because she is now a royal, I just think as the daughter she should speak out or go and see him. Just my opinion

@FashionablyLife @loosewomen @KensingtonRoyal I don’t believe any of that what he’s done... I love the duchess, and I love that she’s American, but when it comes to parents... don’t believe everything you read

@FashionablyLife @loosewomen @KensingtonRoyal Well she wanted him to walk her down the aisle but we all know why he couldn’t, would you have your dad walk you down the aisle if he abused you? No, so I don’t believe any of that
@Mx1969 @loosewomen @KensingtonRoyal No it’s not horseshit, that comes in a pile, it’s just my opinion whether you like it or no

@loosewomen This man is playing games with his daughter emotions. Everyone knows that if she contacts him he will report back to the press and repeat what they said in private in exchange for cash again. There is a saying that says “Fool me once shame on you, Fool me twice shame on me” https://t.co/L8vnHRfvlO

@loosewomen It’s clearly none of y’all business and a father should never cash in on his daughter and son in law by violating their trust and privacy. Maybe he should take lessons from Doria by not talking to the press. What he is doing is called emotional blackmail by using guilt.

@loosewomen I am estranged from my two sisters, both are liars, two faced, conniving and deceitful and I and my family were on the receiving end of it for years. Cant forgive them as they put me through hell.

@loosewomen Truly a private matter . However her father is a disgrace who seems to just want access . Needs to have more to sell . Plays the victim while being abusive . Shows a sense of entitlement in his demands . My sympathy lies with Meghan . Stay strong Duchess

@loosewomen I've got alot of two faced relatives with very short memories of times we have helped them, so no, there loss, certainly not mine! Just walk away! Its a difficult life already, don't need any more heart ache and upset xx

@RickStacey1 @loosewomen @KensingtonRoyal Because it’s the right thing to do, to put the record straight, otherwise this story will go on and on, and Thomas should have all contact with his daughter whether she’s a royal or not
@xanaud @loosewomen Totally agree! Doesn’t she have aproblem with her son in law? #toorighteous
@loosewomen Can't stand Gloria Hunniford's smug self-righteous stance on forgiveness. There are wrongs that cannot and should not be forgiven
@loosewomen Nope ! Depends on everyone's circumstances

@loosewomen My 2 brothers and I dont speak to one another. Haven't spoke to my older brother for around 6 years. Just because they're 'family' doesn't mean you need the negativity or upset in your life. Sometimes we truly are better off without them 👋
@loosewomen Sometimes it’s not so simple. We have a family estrangement issue. This person created so many issues, there is only so many times one can forgive  and forget.
@ashley1413 @loosewomen @KensingtonRoyal Why? What has it got to do with anyone else?

@loosewomen I didn't have any problems with my 3 sister's until mum needed to go into a care home. In the last 12 mths, despite me asking repeatedly fr info & involvement, my 3 sisters cut me out v everything concerning my mum's care. I cannot get this time back & I will never forgive them.

@loosewomen Me and my mum fell out and didn't speak for over a year we reconciled but it was not the same and now she has stopped talking me again l was really hurt both times and don't want to be hurt again so there won't be another chance given
@loosewomen this is a subject that has been discussed a lot in The @TheSilverTent  private FB group, in fact two of our members run support groups for estranged parents

@loosewomen No one knows what has gone on. Only having one Father sometimes does not warrant forgiveness or certain behaviours. Just cos she part of the Royal family does not mean she should have to release a statement. It's inappropriate for people to be discussing others family dynamics

@loosewomen Sometimes it isn’t so easy to forgive - I have given a relative several chances even though they bad mouth me constantly - never to my face - always via social media !! You reach a point where you don’t wish them any harm but enough is enough

@loosewomen I think it’s very sad this has happen, you only get one dad, and I agree with Coleen @KensingtonRoyal should release a status to say what is actually going on because she is a royal now, and this story has been going on for so long now #LOOSEWOMEN #LooseWomen

@loosewomen My mother and brother have not spoken to me for 24 years, I have tried so many times and all attempts have been ignored. My mother has just turned 80, I tried again with no response. Life is too short a fear she will take this to her grave...so tragic! Some you cannot help

@loosewomen He has been her dad before the royal family, ok we don't know the true story but it's sad if they don't communicate anymore, looks like it's down to Megan her dad is trying to reach out. Hope it has a happy ending.
